channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 2026 Men's NCAA Tournament Projections: Nebraska Jumps to No. 1 Seed, Michigan Falls
item.description: FOX Sports bracket forecaster Mike DeCourcy delivers his latest men's NCAA tournament bracket predictions.

item.title: MLB Free Agency Rumors, Buzz: Mets Reportedly Offer Kyle Tucker a $50M Deal
item.description: Keeping track of players who may be on the move, manager comings and goings, and other buzz from around the majors.

item.title: Eagles Fire OC Kevin Patullo After Turbulent Season for Philly's Offense
item.description: For the fifth time in as many years, the Philadelphia Eagles will have a new offensive coordinator.

item.title: Women's College Basketball Top 10, Bubble Team NET Rankings: UCLA Narrows the Gap
item.description: Here are the top 10 women's college basketball teams by NET ranking, who is already fighting on the bubble and the biggest risers and fallers through ...

item.title: How do we fix recruiting and the transfer portal in college football? | Joel Klatt Show
item.description: Joel Klatt explained how we can fix NIL issues, recruiting and the transfer portal in college football.

item.title: Tomlin ends 19-year run as Steelers head coach
item.description: Mike Tomlin has stepped down as Steelers coach, ending a 19-year run in Pittsburgh during which he never had a losing season.

item.title: Man United name Carrick boss until end of season
item.description: Manchester United have appointed former player Michael Carrick as their head coach until the end of the season, the club confirmed Tuesday.

item.title: Mike Tomlin is out as head coach; what's next for Steelers?
item.description: Who could replace Tomlin, how does this impact Aaron Rodgers and the QB position, and more questions.

item.title: Bolts fire OC Roman, OL coach after playoff exit
item.description: The Chargers have fired offensive coordinator Greg Roman and offensive line coach Mike Devlin after their playoff exit, the team announced Tuesday.

item.title: Eagles make change at OC after offense's decline
item.description: The Eagles have removed Kevin Patullo from the offensive coordinator's role, the team announced Tuesday.
